inclusion.criterion: Fetal Life tocometer applied and secured
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient asked to cough for peak synchronization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Monitoring with both tocometers for 45-60 minutes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CTU staff document patient's age, parity, gestational age, and body mass index
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient completes brief survey on monitor comfort
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fetal Life device sanitized and new belt attached
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of systemic mastocytosis with flares, but responded well to treatment and was discharged on home meds. She failed aspirin challenge due to adverse reaction.
